Line 42: Line 42:
You can select the desktop environment within Wubi. But, because each desktop environment is also available as an application package, it is recommended that users install Ubuntu (default option) and from there install the other desktop environments. When you [[login]], you can choose the desktop environment to use.<ref>[http://wubi.sourceforge.net/faq.php Wubi - FAQ<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
You can select the desktop environment within Wubi. But, because each desktop environment is also available as an application package, it is recommended that users install Ubuntu (default option) and from there install the other desktop environments. When you [[login]], you can choose the desktop environment to use.<ref>[http://wubi.sourceforge.net/faq.php Wubi - FAQ<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>

== Problems ==
+
== Limitations ==
*Hibernation/suspend is not supported. <ref>[http://wubi.sourceforge.net/faq.php Wubi - FAQ<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*Hibernation/suspend is not supported. <ref>[http://wubi.sourceforge.net/faq.php Wubi - FAQ<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*Wubi filesystem is more vulnerable to hardreboots (unplugging the power) than a normal filesystem. <ref>[http://wubi.sourceforge.net/faq.php Wubi - FAQ<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*Wubi filesystem is more vulnerable to hardreboots (unplugging the power) than a normal filesystem. <ref>[http://wubi.sourceforge.net/faq.php Wubi - FAQ<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
